title: Uttar Pradesh to extend incentives of up to Rs 1 lakh on EVs
description: Uttar Pradesh offers 15% incentives, capped at Rs 1 lakh, for 25,000 electric cars. Rs 100 crore will support 200,000 two-wheelers. Rs 12,000 or 15% is provided for 30,000 three-wheelers. Rs 20 lakh is allocated for each of the 400 buses. Goods carriers receive up to Rs 100,000 or 10% ex-factory price.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
